name: Close to the sun (itch)
description:
Close to the sun is a community rhythmic game. Build your own levels and share your levels with others. Explore different places by following the rhythms!

Game Features 

- Rhythm-based!

- Lots of levels! 

- Build and share your own levels by using the level editor! 

- No in-app purchases! 

- Customize your avatar! 

- Challenge yourself with more hard levels!

Contact us!

- Our Discord : https://discord.gg/YXngHRD

Artwork by Aexus
